task.title: Configure the XA database driver
task.shortdesc: Add an XA database driver and ensure that the configuration properties are correct.

step.cmd: Ensure that the appropriate scope for where to define the data source is selected.
Select New to add a driver. A configuration screen is displayed.
Select Oracle from the Database type drop-down list.
Select Oracle JDBC Driver from the Provider type drop-down list.
Select XA data source from the Implementation type drop-down list.
Set the Name field to Oracle JDBC Driver (XA), where the field is not automatically completed.
Review the Class path and ensure that the ORACLE_JDBC_DRIVER_PATH environment variable is correct.
Select Next to continue. A configuration screen is displayed.
Review the configuration properties. Typically, changing the properties is not required.
Select Finish to confirm the changes.
